00054 int verbose = 0;
00055 
00056 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && defined(_USRDLL)
00057 #define EXPRT __declspec(dllexport)
00058 #else
00059 #define EXPRT
00060 #endif
00061 
00062 int EXPRT sendmail(char *smtp_host, char *to, char *subject, char *text);
00063 
00064 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00065 
00066 int recv_string(int sock, char *buffer, int buffer_size, int millisec)
00067 {
00068    int i, n;
00069    fd_set readfds;
00070    struct timeval timeout;
00071 
00072    n = 0;
00073    memset(buffer, 0, buffer_size);
00074 
00075    do {
00076       if (millisec > 0) {
00077          FD_ZERO(&readfds);
00078          FD_SET(sock, &readfds);
00079 
00080          timeout.tv_sec = millisec / 1000;
00081          timeout.tv_usec = (millisec % 1000) * 1000;
00082 
00083          select(FD_SETSIZE, (void *) &readfds, NULL, NULL, (void *) &timeout);
00084 
00085          if (!FD_ISSET(sock, &readfds))
00086             break;
00087       }
00088 
00089       i = recv(sock, buffer + n, 1, 0);
00090 
00091       if (i <= 0)
00092          break;
00093 
00094       n++;
00095 
00096       if (n >= buffer_size)
00097          break;
00098 
00099    } while (buffer[n - 1] && buffer[n - 1] != 10);
00100 
00101    return n - 1;
00102 }
00103 
00104 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00105 
00106 int sendmail(char *smtp_host, char *to, char *subject, char *text)
00107 {
00108    struct sockaddr_in bind_addr;
00109    struct hostent *phe;
00110    int s;
00111    char buf[80], host_name[256];
00112    char str[10000];
00113    time_t now;
00114    struct tm *ts;
00115 
00116 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00117    WSADATA WSAData;
00118 
00119    /* Start windows sockets */
00120    if (WSAStartup(MAKEWORD(1, 1), &WSAData) != 0)
00121       return -1;
00122 #endif
00123 
00124    gethostname(host_name, sizeof(host_name));
00125 
00126    /* create a new socket for connecting to remote server */
00127    s = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, 0);
00128    if (s == -1)
00129       return -1;
00130 
00131    /* connect to remote node port 25 */
00132    memset(&bind_addr, 0, sizeof(bind_addr));
00133    bind_addr.sin_family = AF_INET;
00134    bind_addr.sin_port = htons((short) 25);
00135 
00136    phe = gethostbyname(smtp_host);
00137    if (phe == NULL)
00138       return -1;
00139    memcpy((char *) &(bind_addr.sin_addr), phe->h_addr, phe->h_length);
00140 
00141    if (connect(s, (void *) &bind_addr, sizeof(bind_addr)) < 0) {
00142       closesocket(s);
00143       return -1;
00144    }
00145 
00146    recv_string(s, str, sizeof(str), 10000);
00147    if (verbose)
00148       puts(str);
00149 
00150    snprintf(str, sizeof(str) - 1, "HELO %s\r\n", host_name);
00151    send(s, str, strlen(str), 0);
00152    if (verbose)
00153       puts(str);
00154    recv_string(s, str, sizeof(str), 3000);
00155    if (verbose)
00156       puts(str);
00157 
00158    //snprintf(str, sizeof(str) - 1, "MAIL FROM: <labview@%s>\r\n", host_name);  -- needs real mail address
00159    snprintf(str, sizeof(str) - 1, "MAIL FROM: <stefan.ritt@psi.ch>\r\n");
00160    send(s, str, strlen(str), 0);
00161    if (verbose)
00162       puts(str);
00163    recv_string(s, str, sizeof(str), 3000);
00164    if (verbose)
00165       puts(str);
00166 
00167    snprintf(str, sizeof(str) - 1, "RCPT TO: <%s>\r\n", to);
00168    send(s, str, strlen(str), 0);
00169    if (verbose)
00170       puts(str);
00171    recv_string(s, str, sizeof(str), 3000);
00172    if (verbose)
00173       puts(str);
00174 
00175    snprintf(str, sizeof(str) - 1, "DATA\r\n");
00176    send(s, str, strlen(str), 0);
00177    if (verbose)
00178       puts(str);
00179    recv_string(s, str, sizeof(str), 3000);
00180    if (verbose)
00181       puts(str);
00182 
00183    snprintf(str, sizeof(str) - 1,
00184             "To: %s\r\nFrom: labview@%s\r\nSubject: %s\r\n", to, host_name, subject);
00185    send(s, str, strlen(str), 0);
00186    if (verbose)
00187       puts(str);
00188 
00189    time(&now);
00190    ts = localtime(&now);
00191    strftime(buf, sizeof(buf), "%a, %d %b %Y %H:%M:%S", ts);
00192    snprintf(str, sizeof(str) - 1, "Date: %s %+03d%02d\r\n\r\n", buf,
00193             (int) (-timezone / 3600), (int) ((abs(timezone) / 60) % 60));
00194    send(s, str, strlen(str), 0);
00195    if (verbose)
00196       puts(str);
00197 
00198    snprintf(str, sizeof(str) - 1, "%s\r\n.\r\n", text);
00199    send(s, str, strlen(str), 0);
00200    if (verbose)
00201       puts(str);
00202    recv_string(s, str, sizeof(str), 3000);
00203    if (verbose)
00204       puts(str);
00205 
00206    snprintf(str, sizeof(str) - 1, "QUIT\r\n");
00207    send(s, str, strlen(str), 0);
00208    if (verbose)
00209       puts(str);
00210    recv_string(s, str, sizeof(str), 3000);
00211    if (verbose)
00212       puts(str);
00213 
00214    closesocket(s);
00215 
00216    return 1;
00217 }

00219 #if !defined(_USRDLL)
00220 main()
00221 {
00222    verbose = 1;
00223    sendmail("mailsend.psi.ch", "stefan.ritt@psi.ch",
00224             "here comes the subject", "here is the main text");
00225 }
